constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 192 (Tuesday, November 2, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. LESKO:
H.R. 5820
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the U.S. Constitution
[Page H6125]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: To prohibit the use of certain Federal funds to facilitate mandatory vaccination programs, and for other purposes.
